WindLy

Class holding lists of Windy Objects

Properties
list [get]

Get the currently stored list (may be determined anytime)

Functions
byMonitorId
byMonitorId(
id= 1
)

Initializes the window list from a given monitor

Parameters
id

Monitor-Id

Returns

List of Windy Objects on the given monitor

byStyle
byStyle(
myStyle
)

Initializes the window list by given window style

Parameters
myStyle

Windows-Style (Class WS)

Returns

List of Windy Objects matching the given style

delete
delete(
oWindy
)

deletes a single Windy-object from current instance

Parameters
oWindy

Windy Object to be deleted

difference
difference(
oWindLy
)

Calculates the DIFFERENCE of the current instance and the given WindLy-Object

The difference contains only elements from the current instance which are not part of the given WindLy-object

Parameters
oWindLy

WindLy Object to be used for calculating difference

insert
insert(
oWindy
)

Inserts a single Windy-object into current instance

Parameters
oWindy

Windy Object to be inserted

intersection
intersection(
oWindLy
)

Calculates the INTERSECTION of the given WindLy-Object and the current instance

The result only contains Windy Objects which have been in the current instance as well as in the given WindLy-Object

Parameters
oWindy

Windy Object to be inserted

removeNonExisting
removeNonExisting()

Remove non-existing windows from the list

The result only contains Windy Objects which do currently exist. Non existing windows are removed from the list.

snapshot
snapshot()

Initializes the window list from all currently openend windows

Returns

List of Windy Objects.

symmetricDifference
symmetricDifference(
oWindLy
)

Calculates the SYMMETRICDIFFERENCE of the given WindLy-Object and the current instance

The result only contains Windy Objects which have not been in the current instance as well as not in the given WindLy-Object (Removes items which occur in both lists)

Parameters
oWindy

Windy Object to operate with

union
union(
oWindLy
)

Calculates the UNION of the given WindLy-Object and the current instance

The Union contains all elements from the current instance as well as the given WindLy-object

Parameters
oWindLy

WindLy Object to be used for calculating union

__New(
_debug= 0

Constructor (INTERNAL)

Parameters
_debug

Flag to enable debugging (Optional - Default: 0)
